channel.title: Text issue
channel.description: While I'm using firefox with my abyssal theme, I have a [problem that when I type of quite a few sites the content box is black as well as my text, thus meaning I really have to option but to use my own text colour and override the websites, can you think of any way I can change the is so that I can use whiteftext perhaps?

item.title: Text issue
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It sounds like more of a theme issue to me. All I can think of that you can do is use something like greasemonkey to run some javascript that runs after the page loads and changes the font color to white of any text box that is black.

Read full topic
